column2: VARDESC
How many of your friends would you estimate smoke cigarettes?
How many of your friends would you estimate smoke marijuana (pot, weed) or hashish?
How many of your friends would you estimate take “Crack” cocaine?
How many of your friends would you estimate take cocaine powder?
How many of your friends would you estimate drink alcoholic beverages (liquor, beer, wine)?
How many of your friends would you estimate get drunk at least once a week?
How many of your friends would you estimate use an e-cigarette, e-pen, etc.?
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU smoking one or more packs of cigarettes per day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU smoking cigarettes every day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU using smokeless tobacco occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU using smokeless tobacco several times per day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU trying marijuana once or twice smoking marijuana occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU smoking marijuana occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU trying “crack” cocaine once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU trying “crack” cocaine occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU trying cocaine powder once or twice
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU taking cocaine powder occasionally
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU taking one or two drinks nearly every day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU taking four or five drinks nearly every day
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU having five or more drinks once or twice each weekend
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU driving a car after having 1–2 drinks
How do you think your CLOSE FRIENDS feel (or would feel) about YOU driving a car after having 5 or more drinks
